# Euraxess – Welcome Point

Euraxess

Membership of the AGH University of Krakow in the Euraxess Network

We are pleased to announce that AGH University has joined the European EURAXESS network, supporting foreign scientists and the institutions employing them in the field of mobility and career development. The European network EURAXESS – Researchers in Motion…
Read more..

EURAXESS – Grants and Scholarships

We encourage you to read the list of latest offers of research grants and foreign scholarships available to PhD students and researchers. The list is available at this link.
Read more..
